Title: Los inocentes
Writer: Juan Antonio Bardem (screenplay), Juan Antonio Bardem (story), Eduardo Borrás, Antonio Eceiza (story), Elías Querejeta (story)
Actors: Alfredo Alcón, Paloma Valdés, Enrique Fava, Zelmar Gueñol
Plot: A bank employee changes his life radically after the tragic death of his wife in a car accident along with a widower industrial.
